name: See without Eyes
description:
You are a gladiator who must choose the correct weapon to destroy your opponent. The only issue is, you don't know who it is. You must listen for clues as to your enemies identity as you select your weapon.

This is a submission to the Quarantine Jam. The theme was 'invisible enemy'. This has been interpreted in you not being able to see the enemy until you chose your weapons.

This project is far from finished and updates will come soon.
